website_summaries.verdict: Assemble in mere minutes for a great way to build muscle without overtaxing your body.
pros: Ideal for those who want to build and maintain muscle, but not max-out at weight levels suited for a gym environment
Used by men and women, with positive remarks in terms of quality and affordability
We love they fit easily beneath a bed
cons: Customers note the O-rings may fall off, however the set does come with spares

customer_reviews.title: AVOID. WRONG SIZE STAR LOCK
customer_reviews.text: One of the star locks is too big and does not lock rendering one of the dumbbells completely useless. I hope to hear from the seller.
customer_reviews.author: wr17h3

customer_reviews.title: INCREDIBLE AMOUNT OF WEIGHTS FOR THE $
customer_reviews.text: Amazing amount of weights for the money, unreal!!! Super durable and simple design. I've been weight training for 10 years and needed heavier weights (80lbs per dumbbell), which get crazy expensive for non adjustable dumbells. $200 w/ shipping is an absolute steal! I couldn't be happier. Yes there are pits in the castings; yes they have knurled handles for grip, yes there may be scratched paint from shipping, but they are weights meant to be dropped and thrown around while making your body stronger, not placed on a shelf to look at.
customer_reviews.author: Justin S.

customer_reviews.title: A useful set of weights, that don’t weigh what they say
customer_reviews.text: I like these dumbbells because I can get heavier weight than with the fixed weight dumbbells. However, the weights are not accurate and if you do buy them make sure you weigh and mark each one so you know how much you are lifting. In the picture you will see the variety of actual weights compared to the weight stamped. They are shown as pounds then ounces
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfectly good set for the price (Got the 200lb set)
customer_reviews.text: Perfectly good set for the price (Got the 200lb set). Been using them a few months now. As others have said, just be mindful of the o-rings falling off, but it's truly a minor issue. These also came with an extra set of o-rings in case you lose any. As for the grip, I'm a little spoiled by the comfortable ergonomics of my SelecTechs, so I agree with some the standard straight, knurled grip could be better... however, I improved this with some hockey tape
customer_reviews.author: Dean Gullberry

customer_reviews.title: You'll spend more time changing the weights than working out
customer_reviews.text: The clip at the end that holds the weights on spins lose when working out which could case a safety issue. It's just annoying changing the weights. Just spend the extra money buying the dumbbells that easily adjust than spinning the clip off, changing weights, then spinning the clip back on. I have tough hands but the dumbbell bars itself have rough groves which tears your hands up working out.
customer_reviews.author: richard hurt

customer_reviews.title: 105 lbs adjustable cast iron dumbbells
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the 105 lbs adjustable cast iron dumbbells. The packaging was torn upon arrival but it didn't destroy the weights, they look fine. All the correct number of plates and end pieces were accounted for. They are easy to use and the plates are solid. The only downside is having to twists the ends off every time you want to change the weight size. Having said that, it was still one of the best deals online for the price. Plus they don't take up too much space.
customer_reviews.author: mysskay

customer_reviews.title: Missing a piece
customer_reviews.text: The dumbbells look quite good, very well crafted and I'm expecting it'll do what its intended to do, be heavy of course. I'm only giving 1 star because I'm missing the connector that is said to come with it, and I don't appreciate being shorted on the things I buy. I can't seem to find a way to get in contact with the seller, so this is my call for help, so to speak.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Dominique

customer_reviews.title: Best you can get for the price
customer_reviews.text: If you are price sensitive and still looking for a large amount of dead weight, this should be at the top of your list. It works great. Yes, they have some grease on them when they arrive. Clean them off. I'll take this over rusty plates any day. Yes, the spinner lock can loosen slightly while in use. Always check your plates before a set and you are fine. The spinners tend to lock down better over time/use as well. Overall a great buy.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Weingartner

customer_reviews.title: Comes apart during high rep exercises
customer_reviews.text: I don't know how to give different ratings for features. It's the overall use that sucks. I am using just 40lbs for dual curls and no matter how hard I tighten, WITH the rubber rings inserted, they come loose after just 10 reps. I cannot imagine doing 20 like I normally would without them falling the heck apart! Speaking of the rubber, I bought these to quickly change between weights. Forget that, it's useless if you don't want to spend enormous amounts of time between sets. Get modular weights with proper locking. These are nownpapee weights and might sell on Craiglist to just dump them for half the price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Impossible to find additional plates
customer_reviews.text: Don’t get me wrong, these weights do exactly what they’re intended for. I just wouldn’t purchase them again because it’s impossible to find extra weights for the 105 or 200 lb set since they went with a 1.15 inch dumbbell diameter. Yes4all doesn’t even sell the 1.15 inch weights and I haven’t been able to find anything that works, I wouldn’t buy these again if I had the option.
customer_reviews.author: Neil Daniels

customer_reviews.title: Weights hold firmly in place
customer_reviews.text: These are fantastic, especially considering the price/weight ratio. The only downside I found was that there most definitely is a smell. Anyone who cannot detect a smell should go see a doctor. Note to seller: clean these things!!! Anyway, other than that, they are great. The weights come off and on easy enough, and although the rubber seals tend to fall out, I haven't found them to be absolutely necessary.
customer_reviews.author: Nobody

customer_reviews.title: Weights are good. Collars are really bad
customer_reviews.text: Edited my review: the collars are terrible. Nothing like being on your 5th rep and the weight is sliding all over the bar because the collar keeps spinning loose. Look elsewhere for a better product. As advertised. All the weights are there. Two bars for setting up various weights. Issue is the collars don’t work well. The weights constantly spin loose which is frustrating. I’ve tried the collars both ways without any luck. Also have cranked them very tight and they won’t stay.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Avoid buying
customer_reviews.text: Do not purchase from this company. They refuse to give refunds if you are not happy with the product and then Charge you half of what you paid to ship them back. Very disappointed with this seller. I am a loyal amazon buyer and this has been the first time I have had a major issue with a seller. There are many other companies that sell great dumbells and so I would def go to those. The whole process of loading up the weights and removing them is cumbersome and the weights do not stay stable they wobble which makes for not a pleasant work out.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Kontak

customer_reviews.title: Cracking paint / enamel coating
customer_reviews.text: Weights work fine but packing left a lot to be desired. Paint / enamel coating cracked, chipping, and otherwise failing out of the box. Package arrived with nearly nothing in the way of packing material save for small amounts of plastic which let the weights rub against each other and move around in the box during shipping. I happen to not be storing these in a very damp place, but I would not recommend to someone with a gym in their basement.
customer_reviews.author: Keith Eitel

customer_reviews.title: Very dangerous to use after the first few months of use
customer_reviews.text: These weights were great for the first couple months. I tore my Achilles and needed weights for my at home workouts. However, after a couple months, the cheap coating used on the dumbbells started to flake off and litter my floor. No big deal right? WRONG. Now, when I take weight off or put it on, it flakes off and jabs me in the hands and fingers, breaking skin, sitting inside my skin,and bleeding. Now I'm cutting myself daily during use. I'll upload pictures if/when Amazon allows it. Great, cheap weights for use during COVID-19 but it's only a matter of time before you start getting cut from these.
customer_reviews.author: DIGGITYDIGS

customer_reviews.title: review
customer_reviews.text: great price really cant complain. however that being said the paint on the outside of the weights are flaking off a tad. ive been very gentle with them and i set them on dry clean carpet and still flaking. regardless of that tiny issue. great product for price , would recommend to friends that being said i live on a second story in my apt, and the way it was packaged my 140 lb ish mail lady brought it up(all 3 packages + a weight bench weighing about 300lbs total) i honestly expected to have to haul it from the post office myself. 10/10 would praise mail lady xD
customer_reviews.author: daniel schalk

customer_reviews.title: Overpriced
customer_reviews.text: The weights arrived very quickly and in good condition, I did end up weighing the ten pound weights and turns out they actually weighed 9.2 pounds each, not ten☹️ The weights are also fairly thin and appear to be very fragile so do not drop. I’d assume they make them thin hoping you break them and have to buy more of their weights.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: Horrible packaging, product arrived damaged
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited to get these weights and am now so disappointed. The product and box arrived badly damaged. There was absolutely no padding in or around the box and the weights and parts were stacked on top of each other and separated only by a thin layer of plastic. Horrible shipping and packaging. I intend to return these
customer_reviews.author: Punchie

customer_reviews.title: Very high quality
customer_reviews.text: For the cost of a month membership at my local gym, I bought these in the 50 lb set. The bars are beautifully finished, threads are nicely machined and the grips are just right. The locking nuts go on and off fast and hold the plates really tight. Much better than the dumbbells at the gym. Glad I got them. Resistance training benefits bone strength as well as muscle strength, ideal for women as well as men. I use ab straps for the torso, and mountain biking for legs and endurance. At 71 I am fitter than most people half my age :)
customer_reviews.author: Angela B.

customer_reviews.title: Adjustable sets are not interchangeable
customer_reviews.text: I already purchased the adjustable weight set from Yes4All that goes up to 105 lbs. and thought if I purchased the 60 lbs. adjustable set I can go up in weight since I am already maxed out at the 105 lbs. set for the majority of exercises. To my surprise, the 5 lbs. adjustable weights in the 60 lbs. set don't fit the 105 lbs. dumbbells, what kind of crap is that? The description in all the sets from Yes4All state 1" plates but they are slightly smaller and will not fit my other set of dumbbells. So basically in order for me to add more weight is to purchase the 200 lbs. set for another $200, no thanks!!!
customer_reviews.author: Chris Ercoli

customer_reviews.title: Pleasantly Surprised
customer_reviews.text: I was really surprised at how much I like these dumbbells. Perhaps the 3 month wait for them to arrive made me desperate, but they are actually quite good for the price. Also, a tip - save the foam packaging for storage to save your floors! Pros: - sturdy, no giggling plates - easy to hold - not so big to be impractical - can buy more plates to vary weight (photo showing extra plates) Cons: - there's only 2 plate sizes, so though these are adjustible, you have minimal combinations - a little slow to adjust, but easier than I expected
customer_reviews.author: Nina

customer_reviews.title: Good product!
customer_reviews.text: You can't go wrong with dumbbells, so I am happy with the product, but there are 2 reasons they didn't get 5 stars from me. 1. One of the bars came slightly rusted at one the threads for the weight lock. 2. During my work out I got stuck by a piece of chrome that peeled from one side of the dumbbell. I had to peel it completely off to prevent future bleeding. I'm not a wuss, but I don't enjoy drawing blood for nothing.
customer_reviews.author: Sgt Friday

customer_reviews.title: Solid Weights
customer_reviews.text: Great starter set weight set for a great price. A few things to know; You should take some time to clean the threads because they have been machined and may still have some metal fragments that will cut. I used a wet rag and finished with WD40 to protect the metal. The plates will fit on any standard weight bar, so I also purchased a long bar to complement the weight set. I also plan on purchasing additional heavier weight plates because loading the ten pound plates can get tedious after awhile. But overall, this is a great starter set of weight plates and dumbbell bars to purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Joey

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality, far more Cost Effective
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely nothing wrong with the quality of this 200lb set! And far more cost effective than buying individual, wieghted dumbbells. I bought two extra pair of the 1.15" bars for $43, and now I have a 45lb pair, a 35lb pair, and a 25lb pair, and of course, can build a heavier pair as I work up to it. This method saves a lot of time that would be involved in changing out the weights. As for the Wimps who complain that the "spiny-ness of the grips hurt their hands... seriously people? Man-up! They are no different than anything else on the market. These are very good quality! If your hands are that tender, wear workout gloves.
customer_reviews.author: Cindyc

customer_reviews.title: Don’t expect complicated excercises with these.
customer_reviews.text: Well made. Haven’t had an issue with the product loosing and risking the weight plates falling off. The only negative is that the bar is so long that two barbells get in the way of each other. Either that or you smack yourself with the bar doing some excercises. Granted they can’t do anything about that with this type of product. So just be aware that the some excercises can’t be done with proper form because of the bar extending past the plates. Like dumbbell pull overs. I’m 5’8 and almost smacked myself in the head with the bar. Had to stop doing the excercises. People with longer reaches probably wouldn’t have as much of an issue.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon

customer_reviews.title: DOES NOT FIT.
customer_reviews.text: It does not fit. I have all the Yes4All dumbbells and plates and everything. All of it is from Yes4All as a set and I was expecting this to fit but it didn’t. It barely screwed on about 1/2 of an inch and would not go further. The threading itself does not match. Very disappointed....
customer_reviews.author: Lydia

customer_reviews.title: Wish i ordered more!
customer_reviews.text: Got this in January knowing the pandemic would hit but i thought i got more weights then i did. Now i wish i ordered more because these are amazing! Imagine an expensive system like the others system but without wasting all that money... and you can also bench with it.. granted 50 lbs is not a lot to bench.... like i said i wish i bought more weights for it. This is an amazing system and i would always recommend it pandemic or not.
customer_reviews.author: Boris L

customer_reviews.title: I have to take a few stars off for a few reasons
customer_reviews.text: 1. There are like 10 different products sold under one item so finding a review for the specific item you bought is difficult. 2. The item I bought (adjustable kettlebell) is made entirely out of plastic and rubber. If I knew it was made only out of plastic and rubber I probably wouldn't have bought it. That being said, it's exactly what I wanted (minus the material) and, despite it being made out of plastic and rubber, it seems solid enough that it should hold up. I'll come back and update my review after I've had time to use it to give feedback on if using plastic/rubber was adequate or if it should have been made of something more durable.
customer_reviews.author: S. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Good value, with minor quality issues to be expected
customer_reviews.text: Useable weights for the money - I bought the 60lb dumbell set. While the packaging at least kept everything together, there was not enough padding to keep the disks from banging against each other during shipping. So there were places where the black paint got chipped. I really don't care about appearance - useability is not affected, but it makes for a bad first impression. Even some simple thin foam envelopes for each disk would have prevented this. The collars get loose easily since the set screws don't have levers to help you get them tight. I think another reviewer replaced them with lever-style screws, which sounds like a good idea.
customer_reviews.author: Fair Witness

customer_reviews.title: Watch for metal splinters
customer_reviews.text: These basically do the job, though I got metal splinters from either the dumbbells or the barbell attachment. The "black paint finish" arrived chipped off in the plastic bags for several of the weights due to the lack of any separators or padding between the plates during shipment. I would have preferred that the dumbbells had a larger diameter, like in the gym, for a more comfortable grip. These seem to be about 1". Maybe that's the case with these home sets. EDIT; Rating raised to 4 stars. Company has excellent customer service and helped us with the product issues.
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: was pleasantly surprised.
customer_reviews.text: I thought this was going to be pretty "meh" but I was actually impressed to see a rubber gasket on the end-caps to prevent slipping, and a set-screw that allows you to lock the end caps so they don't loosen up over time. much better than the cheap-o walmart ones. only negative is that the grip is really rough. I wrapped the grop with cloth tape so that it wasn't so hard on my hands.
customer_reviews.author: some guy

customer_reviews.title: Look for other better options
customer_reviews.text: Wanted to give it really good rating as it was the best dumbbells in the price range. I was traveling for more than a month so couldn’t open the box when it was delivered. Finally collect my package from my community office today and I am not so happy. Pros: 1. Plates and rode not too big compared to other dumbbells and easy to hold. 2. On time delivery. Cons: 1. Giving it 3 stars because the packing was not original and received it in a torn usps box. 2. The product seems to be used and not new as the dumbbell plates has chipped of paint marks and little dented.
customer_reviews.author: Aakash

customer_reviews.title: Most bang for your buck
customer_reviews.text: I couldn't find ANY weights at a price-per-pound this good except rusty, used ones. Even single-piece dumbbells almost always cost more than this. Unlike some other reviews, my star collars tighten down very snugly and the texture on the bar is pleasantly grippy without being rough. Slight bummer that it's an uncommon diameter size for the heavier weight sets, and this is probably over-doing it for flat-rate boxes. But I just finished my first work-out with them and they're just plain good. Unless you want to pay 3 times the price to get Bowflex's slick adjustable dumbbells, this is it right here.
customer_reviews.author: Sean

customer_reviews.title: This is a high quality set, with everything well ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a high quality set, with everything well machined. No rough casting edges here, it's all smooth and the collars thread onto the handles very smoothly and quickly. One thing to be aware of that was not clear when I ordered. According to my scales, each handle with its collars weighs 4.9 lb. That's not a problem for me since these were intended to move up incrementally from a set of fixed hand weights that top out at 5 lb each. With the assortment of weights in this set I can increase weights gradually as far as I'll ever manage.
customer_reviews.author: Walter Pirie

customer_reviews.title: Quality Control!
customer_reviews.text: It’s a great amount of weight and convenience for the price. Quality control is a big issue here...I ordered 2 x 52.5 packs. In both packs, several of the 5lb plates are chipping (literally as they come out of the package) and 2 of the 1.25 lb plates don’t fit the bars (hole diameter too small). They’ll either make it right or they’ll get them back and have to pay what I assume is a ridiculous shipping cost for the return...
customer_reviews.author: Alex Washkowitz

customer_reviews.title: Quality durable weights.
customer_reviews.text: They're solid, secure, and just about the most bang you could get for your buck. I didn't get any weird oils or smells, the package was split in 2 boxes and safely package, and it arrived on time. This is where you should start, not with a gym membership. If you can get your workout done 10ft from your laptop and xbox then you're training your discipline, which will save you wasted gym money in the long run.
customer_reviews.author: Bernardo

customer_reviews.title: Get lifting gloves and be careful not to poke yourself!
customer_reviews.text: These were pretty good and by far the best deal on Amazon for weights of this kind. My two complaints are: 1) The grip on these is pretty rough; you definitely need gloves if you're going to lift any substantial amount of weight or do so regularly with these bad boys. And 2) the ridged part where the cap screws on is pretty long, so if you don't have a ton of plates on these, they basically have metal poles sticking out which are easy to poke yourself with when doing a shoulder press or bench press. You get used to it, but beware on your first few lifts! You'll poke your eye out, kid.
customer_reviews.author: Skibs

customer_reviews.title: Great weights for the price
customer_reviews.text: So I only gave it a 4 just because the fit and finish isn't that great. They aren't what you'd expect to find at a gym. But for home use and the price, they are solid. Definitely a good value. When I opened them there was some flakes of paint in the box, but I put them together outside and there were no other problems. Spinners go off and one easily and lock down well.
customer_reviews.author: Emily Wright

customer_reviews.title: Good weights, bad splinters
customer_reviews.text: Weights themselves are accurate, but I find the grip too small (I'm a 5'3" female). I prefer the rubbered other set we have. Also, PREPARE FOR SPLINTERS!!! My hubby and I have both had to pull out shards of black metal. At the last count, he pulled out 9 pieces from one hand. Decent weights with the ability to use other sets, but those splinters suck!
customer_reviews.author: Delaney Spencer

customer_reviews.title: I'm impressed!
customer_reviews.text: I was really skeptical of these, but you can't beat the price. I was shocked that those with the protective silicone covers were CHEAPER. They arrived yesterday, and I've had two workouts with them. Easy to put together, good quality. They smell fine and are not oily (had seen similar complaints on competitor products). Will probably be getting another set in the next few months.
customer_reviews.author: Gina Marie

customer_reviews.title: Just what is Necessary!
customer_reviews.text: Great dumbbell set all around. Price and performance are spot on. 100lbs x 2 at $1 per lbs with 16" inch chrome handlebars that allow you to stack all the plates - just sweat. It come with rubber rings. They go on the insides of each handle - help prevent some of the clang and bang when sliding the weights on and off bar. Helpful tips, I place the small plates (2.5 lbs.) on the inside. Gives my hand more clearance for some exercises. For instance, during a "farmers carry", my hands are all over the place at full weight and prefer the additional hand clearance provided the spacing of the smaller plates.
customer_reviews.author: Tech Henry

customer_reviews.title: Missing 3 lb weight
customer_reviews.text: Great set of hand weights for the price considering all weights sets prices have risen dramatically. Problem is I was only shipped three 3lb weights instead of the four per the 50 lb x 2 order & now have to go thru the hassle of trying to get the fourth 3 lb weight. Basically ruins the initial buying experience. Would have been a five star purchase otherwise. I contacted Amazon to get the missing weight, but was told couldn’t ship one item & would have to return entire set (50lbs w 14 items) & reorder. I’m not going thru that aggravation of repacking & shipping. Very very disappointed in missing item process. Amazon customer service has definitely taken a downturn.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Becvar

customer_reviews.title: I couldn’t be happier with these!
customer_reviews.text: The dumbbell set just arrived and they’re perfect! Much higher quality than my expectations. These look like professional metal plate weights you would see at the gym. They have a silicone ring around each weight to keep from marring up the floor. The handles are nicely formed and solid, giving you an exceptional grip. The screw downs fit perfectly and lock the plates into place securely. The bonus is the middle attachment, turning the set into a press bar. LOVE these!! If you’re debating over buying these, stop debating and GET THEM.
customer_reviews.author: Clockwork_Viking

customer_reviews.title: Bargain price with solid quality
customer_reviews.text: I read some negative reviews about an oily feel to the weights, small barbs on the handles and other minor design flaws. Personally I had none of those issues. Even if I did for the price it's hard to beat this set. I have owned them for about 3 months and use them almost every day. The weights stay in place well and swapping them out is easy. Could they be a little easier to change weight? Sure. Once again I want to reiterate, for the price range this is a great set. If you want a few dumbells that can go from 5 to 55 lbs this is perfect for you!
customer_reviews.author: Derek M.

customer_reviews.title: Good starter at home workout equipment
customer_reviews.text: I find it easy to store, relatively easy to assemble / disassemble. The hand grips are metal with traction patterns, as expected. One time my anchor piece started to get a little loose, requiring adjustment. That was with initial use and I haven't had a repeat event. Overall, I would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan

customer_reviews.title: Great space saver
customer_reviews.text: I bought these like many others due to the gyms being closed from Covid. They are easy to assemble right out the box with no instructions needed. Just slide the weights on and enclose with the collar. The handle bar could use some refining as it was a little to rough on the hands to grip. Almost feel as if I may cut myself sometimes when doing curls. Other than that the dumbbells are exactly as described. Great space saver as you only need one pair to replace about 20 dumbbells. I also like that they are more compact than some other adjustable dumbbells. Makes for better range of motion working out.
customer_reviews.author: Jon

customer_reviews.title: Watch your toes
customer_reviews.text: It came as a nicely finished product, very easy to assemble. The things I didn't care for is the bar diameter is smaller than most dumbbells. secondly while working out the weights fell off and hit me on the toes. I thought it was my fault so I tighten the nut tighter, still came off. I had all the weights on but that shouldn't matter . I feel the thread design needs work. I would have sent them back but the box was toast when I got it.
customer_reviews.author: Bilster

customer_reviews.title: Great weight set for the price
customer_reviews.text: I bought these as a means to have a variety of weight ranges at a low cost. They work great. They feel great. They actually look really good. When you have a lot of plates on, it makes you feel strong, even though they are five pound plates. The plates stay secured with the spin on brackets and I get no spin or slippage of the plates. The only draw back I can find to the spinning brackets is the time it takes. If you are trying to change loadout quickly, it just takes a little longer than, say, spring locks.
customer_reviews.author: Bart Harper

customer_reviews.title: Danger! Keep Away!
customer_reviews.text: Like many others, I got a metal shaving stuck in my finger, there was blood all over the Dumbbell. Threw these things right in the garbage.
customer_reviews.author: butters13

customer_reviews.title: Heavy and Fast! A great deal!
customer_reviews.text: Really love these weights. The chrome is crisp and smooth, important for quickly spinning off the locks. Knurling is decent and gives good grip. Plates were chipped and scratched in the corners or on the faces from shipping; I don't care but you might! Not a show piece for me; just heavy stuff to pick up. I bought the 105lb set, and they're all I'll ever need for a long time. With so many plates, I may buy another set of handles so I can leave them set up in two different weights. Definitely a good deal, and CRAZY fast shipping via Priority flat-rate even though it wasn't listed as Prime. I'm a very happy customer!
customer_reviews.author: Ocean

customer_reviews.title: Super versatile!
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a cheap way to get a good number of weights and this sure fit the bill! The bars have a nice not to aggressive trxture. The weights are sturdy. There's no unpleasent accompanying smell that alot of weights have, and all and all they have given me a variety to my workout that single size dumbells couldn't. The Inside diameter of the weights is 1.15" which will be a little big on a 1" bar! Other than that great! I do wish yes4all would make a 1.15" bar so I can use these for other workouts.
customer_reviews.author: Cass

customer_reviews.title: DONT BUY - PAINT CHIPS EVERYWHERE
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product, returned it, got a replacement, and had to return it too. Just taking the packing off my hands get covered in chipped paint. It was extremely disappointing as it is not an easy item to repackage and return. Do not waste your time on these. Also make sure you actually get a refund for the replacement because when I tried returning the replacement it said it was a $0 refund because the replacement was technically $0. Having to call Amazon to then ensure I receive a refund is just an additional pain.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: Okay value for the money. Would not buy again if other affordable options were available.
customer_reviews.text: Pros: One of the few reasonably priced adjustable dumbbells right now (July 2020 - high demand due to Covid). Cons: The paint chips the very moment the weights are unpacked. The threads are not grated and extremely sharp. Finally, the handles are at their limits, it is not possible to fit even one more plate on to increade the weight. Summary: You get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: user

customer_reviews.title: Great find with a great price!
customer_reviews.text: Honestly I was very skeptical given the price (paid about $80 for a pair of 30lbs dumbbells set), especially considering how impossible it is to find weight equipment since the quarantine started. I was surprised in a very good way. Delivery was fast and the product is great. Also, you can adjust the weights and have sets of 20lbs and 14lbs, as well as 30lbs. Highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: turkinla

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as described
customer_reviews.text: For the price, you really can't go wrong. The casting of the weights themselves isn't the best, and the paint tends to chip off a bit, but these are things I don't mind considering how much cheaper this option is compared to many others. I'd definitely buy again, and I'm probably going to end up buying another smaller set just to augment this one and have more dumbbells around. Great value here. I do, however, feel bad for the poor USPS delivery person. The 200 lb set arrived quickly in 3 (well packed) boxes with no visible flaws. This is something to keep in mind if you have to move the boxes much.
customer_reviews.author: some guy

customer_reviews.title: This set comes highly recommended.
customer_reviews.text: For the price ($199.99, shipping included), I have no complaints, only praise. All twenty-four weight plates were weighed and found to be within 1 to 2oz from their stated weight, with the exception of two 10lb weight plates weighing 9lbs 8oz each. Likewise, each handle and collar set collectively weighed 5lbs. No issues with greasy or damaged plates or rough and/or uncomfortable handles were found. This set comes highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Comperic2003

customer_reviews.title: Good dumbbells!
customer_reviews.text: Good dumbbells, very sturdy and reliable. The collars screw on easily and stay secure. No chance they are slipping off. I also love the extension bar which allows you to make a full size bar. My only complaint is they were pretty pricy and changing the weight after each set is kind of a pain. Also the bar sticks out from the weights about 5” and it hinders certain lifts. Still A Good dumbbell set with plenty of weight to meet all my purposes.
customer_reviews.author: Tbone

customer_reviews.title: Cast is chipped and crude - poor quality
customer_reviews.text: The cast is poor and chipped and the weights smell like chemicals. Pleanty of picts from other customers to see the poor cast quality. Should have bought a set from Dicks . Never again from this company
customer_reviews.author: stuff n things

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for what I need at this time.
customer_reviews.text: Honestly they were perfect, I'm in the army and especially with Corona closing down the gyms I don't get to train there. But luckily I can get a full body workout with these, whether it's goblet squats or lunges for legs, or regular bicep curls and tricep extensions. I can adjust the weight and it's perfect. It also saves up a ton of space because I don't have all the other dumbbells so it's perfect for a small gym space.
customer_reviews.author: Ivory Uruk Hai

customer_reviews.title: Good but not perfect
customer_reviews.text: Finding dumbbells during pandemic is a big issue. I ordered it in June and finally received it in August. The dumbbells serve the purpose but adding removing weights is not easy. If you workout with different weights during a single session you'll spend a good amount of time adding and removing weights. Also the screw cap that holds he weights unscrews itself at times so you will have to constantly keep an eye on it while working out.
customer_reviews.author: Malai

customer_reviews.title: Great product, came in a couple different boxes
customer_reviews.text: Great product, came in a couple different boxes. Big issue with this type of system is the time it takes to unscrew the collar X 4 collars. You cant put these square on your legs when prepping for an exercise. You have to put them mostly hanging off your leg. Otherwise good product for a budget home gym.
customer_reviews.author: Brett

customer_reviews.title: Decent but have issues with some lifts.
customer_reviews.text: I'm used to using the solid dumbbells at the gym and didn't want to spring to the bowflex adjustable ones, so these seemed like a decent compromise. The one issue I have is the length of the bars, which comes to be an issue when your trying to do bench or overhead press. Also the ends don't always stay very tight, so I have to re-tighten them often. In hindsight, I should have just bought the bowflex ones, because while these don't suck, the little things like I described tend to bother me when used frequently.
customer_reviews.author: Bret Riedel

customer_reviews.title: Very versatile
customer_reviews.text: This weight set can convert from dumb bells to barbell in just a few minutes. The weights provided are perfect for getting started or for maintenance. The price is perfect. It took about a week for mine to be delivered, so not as fast as I would have preferred, but, fast enough. I'd certainly buy this again. I don't anticipate having to do that...these will serve my purposes for a long time.
customer_reviews.author: R. Shirley

customer_reviews.title: solid set of weights
customer_reviews.text: Do they unscrew as you use them? Of course - every set that has adjustable weights does. You just have to be careful when using these kind of weights in general, but you should be fine for a set of ten or twenty without any problems. If you're doing crazy exercises where you're holding the weights for a 6 exercise circuit these might not be for you but otherwise it's a great set at a great price.
customer_reviews.author: Avid film watcher

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price, but has flaws
customer_reviews.text: These dumbbells are solid for at home workouts. I got the 60 lb set and its good for a light workout on rest days. The issue I have with these is the grab handle is a bit too rough, for heavier weights I suggest using gloves or they will scrape or burn your hands. The other issue is sometimes the tighteners will come a bit lose and will make slightly annoying sounds. You will need to retighten them constantly. Overall, an OK purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: great price
customer_reviews.text: Ive had these weights for over a year now and I've been using them more often during this pandemic as gyms are closed. For the price paid, the quality is amazing. The packaging, from what I remembered, was a bit sloppy and weak which resulted in some of the paint on the weights being chipped during shipment. Otherwise, these are great for free weight workouts!
customer_reviews.author: Hong

customer_reviews.title: Extremely pleased with the product
customer_reviews.text: Not much to say here. Package arrived earlier than expected, came in 3 boxes (pictures attached) each weighing in around ~60 lbs. Everything was packaged tight and all weights were accounted for, and I didn't observe any of the paint chipping or what not that some people complained about. I haven't owned the weights for long but I've seen no issues with the rubber trims. To the people saying the handles are uncomfortable - grow up, get some weight gloves. There were no issues with any of the items being greasy or otherwise. Would definitely recommend this to other buyers.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Platov

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic product, easy to adjust weights.
customer_reviews.text: I bought them for my small gym and was very surprised at the ease of changing the weights. the chromelike finish on bar is solid; no signs of potential flaking. rubber gaskets to keep the weights from moving or clanking. the black coating on weights is solid so rusting is inhibited. I am very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Maxatawny Mike

customer_reviews.title: Iron Price
customer_reviews.text: This is a good spin-lock dumbbell. The handle feels good and the collars lock nicely. I feel comfortable doing dumbbell snatches with these, the collars lock the plates in tightly and the handle is comfortable. The weight plates are accurate. Packing was secure and the everything arrived in pristine condition. The dumbbell handle and locks arrived a bit oily, but I'd rather have that than rust. I'll be buying more of these to fill out my dumbbell needs for the home-gym.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew S

customer_reviews.title: Cheap but who cares?
customer_reviews.text: This is by no means a pro set of weights. The plates are essentially just spray-painted black and chip easily. I have flakes on my floor straight out of the box. But I didn't buy weights to have them sit on my mantle and look pretty. If you're looking for the cheapest way to sling around 200 pounds in free weight, this is it. Not a 5-star set, but they 100% serve their purpose. By the time I need heavier dumbbells than this (if ever), it would be more cost effective to just drive to the gym.
customer_reviews.author: D L

customer_reviews.title: Best deal for the weight
customer_reviews.text: Best price for the total dumbbells weight you can find. Taking much less space to store in comparison to multi-weight dumbbells. Easy to adjust by changing plates. However, if you're changing weight too often, you may not like these. Locks are not the best and you need to check them every new exercise. Overall these are very good option if you're on the budget. I have them for over a year, and so far I like it.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Better than the adjustable weights. You can use the smaller weights for other things
customer_reviews.text: Good weights. I should have bought these earlier these are better than buying fat burner pills or running or going to the gym. I just have these next to my bed and lift weights in bed and watch TV. these are also better than the adjustable weight rack because you can use the smaller plates to roll on your sore muscles or make your own weights for differet muscle groups. you can do almost everything you would at the gym.
customer_reviews.author: This is my public name

customer_reviews.title: These are almost great
customer_reviews.text: These arrived today and I was really looking forward to coming home from work and using them in my workout this evening. Unfortunately, I've spent an hour just fighting to get the stickers off of the handles on the dumbbells. The stickers are covering the area where you're meant to screw the collars on and have been a fight to remove. Why it was necessary to put a sticker on both sides of both handles is beyond me when all of the stickers give the exact same warning. I also realized once finally done dealing with stickers that a number of the plates are already chipped and missing patches of black.
customer_reviews.author: Melanie

customer_reviews.title: Missing one bar
customer_reviews.text: It's my fault for waiting so long but the description said it was a set of two. I only received one dumbell bar not two. I should have checked when it came in but I had to wait on all my equipment to be set up and just opened the boxes to find it short one. Just check your packages early!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Poor quality....one of the plate holes are angled and it will not slide onto bar....AND one of the bars threads are off So the end piece will not tighten... waste of money
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: poor coating leads to poor durability
customer_reviews.text: The black coating on the weight plates was chipping the day they arrived. If you graze the weight against your workout clothes- it creates pulls in the fabric. There are black paint flecks all over my floor now. Where the paint has come off- there is rust. The weight bar itself is great. The locking mechanism- also great. The plates are just horrible- making for an overall poor system.
customer_reviews.author: jennifer l. haddock

customer_reviews.title: Plates wil fall off during workout.... Cheap and unsafe
customer_reviews.text: The plate hold end cap will unscrew while you are working out. Its very annoying having the re tighten the locking nut. Do not buy this product unless you do not mind uneven loads during your sets due to the caps unthreading.
customer_reviews.author: Chrissy

customer_reviews.title: Great for your home gym
customer_reviews.text: Would have received 5 stars if the adhesive label hadn't been so difficult to remove from the product. I had looked at different home weight systems with the quick-removal latch-on type weights. And I had read too may reviews about those weights unlatching and falling off in the middle of a lift... That won't be a problem with this product. Very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: T. R. SCHAEFER

customer_reviews.title: I'm so glad I got these!
customer_reviews.text: I got the 200 lbs. pair, and LOVE THEM. I'm finally using them more and it really adds variety to my workouts in my basement "gym," and didn't break the bank. I've head them for 2 years in my basement, and there's is very little to no rust one the plats, and none on the handles. These handles are slightly larger than 1", they're like 1.12-1.15", so keep that in mind if you buy another set to mix in with them.
customer_reviews.author: Hambone

customer_reviews.title: Felt bad for the courier
customer_reviews.text: These things are heavy felt bad for the postman watching him transport 3 boxes to my front porch. Kudos to him he laid them down slowly and stacked them up. Love these dumbbells, lots of configurations for different exercises.
customer_reviews.author: Manny

customer_reviews.title: Great Value for Money
customer_reviews.text: Not a professional set, but will work. Paint is flaky, and I wouldn't drop or they may break, but control your work out, and no issues. One of my clips broke day one, but company sent a replacement right away. I'd give these 3-1/2 starts. Totally worth it during Coronavirus.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good dumbbells, poorly packed, arrived chipped/scratched
customer_reviews.text: Good set of dumbbells, arrived quickly. Poorly packed, both packages partly broken open during shipping and all of the dumbbell plates are chipped, scratched, paint chips and paint dust all over my floor upon opening them. Not the end of the world, as they are just dumbbells, but disappointing, as previous ones I received were in pristine condition. Also, weigh slightly less than advertised, but not enough to make a difference.
customer_reviews.author: Adam Sheck

customer_reviews.title: Spraypaint smell, plus crappy pain. = s***
customer_reviews.text: Nice set of weights, the Chinese love to huf spray paint, the plates smell bad and the paint is very thin, I imagine it wont last long. Why bother? Im not sure but china must not have "no VOC" paint. As with all Yes4All brand stuff it stinks. Either like paint or if its rope it will smell like a sewer, creosilt.
customer_reviews.author: samdrucker

customer_reviews.title: A good investment for working out at home
customer_reviews.text: These weights work just as well as any you might use at the gym, so are a sound investment if you work out regularly. There is enough room on the bar for expansion of plates, which is nice. The only thing I disliked about this product was that one of the collars continuously comes loose on me. It is not coming so loose that the plates fall off, but I still dislike the fact that I will tighten the collar only to find it loose some minutes later, regardless of how loose it becomes. This suggests to me that the quality of the product is not as high as it could be.
customer_reviews.author: Baron

customer_reviews.title: Fortunately I noticed it on my hands before they ever ...
customer_reviews.text: You can't beat the price on these dumbbells. Simple and clear, these are exactly what they say. They come brand new so watch for the black coating to scuff off a bit on whatever surface you put them on. Fortunately I noticed it on my hands before they ever touched the rug. Sure it would be nice to have the auto changing sets, but who can afford that extra convenience. These are all ya need!
customer_reviews.author: Bilbo Baggins

customer_reviews.title: Very good for the money.
customer_reviews.text: Positives The dumbbells are as advertised. Easy to load and change weights, the screw cap with rubber gasket is a breeze to set and change. Very good for the money. Negatives Slight gripes are the screws come slightly loosened during normal use. Although this isn't an issue, there is no danger of them coming off completely, I can see them being damaged over time. Possibly needing replacement and I don't believe there are any for sale. So if these don't hold up over the years this purchase might not have been worth it.
customer_reviews.author: knewcomb

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Quality seems really great. I really like the old school feel. These can be set anywhere between 5 lbs and 52.5 lbs in 2.5 lb increments. The fittings are high quality. The knurl is really good. These are perfect for my son. The only thing I would want for myself, being a bit older, is I like a bit of an ergonomic rounding-out to the bar, which these to not have. But the old school gym feel of these is very cool and functional. Well done!
customer_reviews.author: G

customer_reviews.title: Weights sharp and splintering
customer_reviews.text: These were a great concept; bought them for my girlfriend because she wanted a set of dumbbells and a barbell, and this was everything in one. Immediately regretted the purchase when she went to use it and the plates had sharp edges and a splintering outer layer that cut her and splintered in her hands. Don’t buy. Spend a little extra and get a nice set of weights.
customer_reviews.author: Dakota Rosell

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, Easy to Change out Weights!  Love these!
customer_reviews.text: I really like these. I have been using them for about a week and couldn't be more pleased. It is fast and easy to change out weights. I don't find the bar to be uncomfortable at all as some people have reported. I find it very comfortable and like the anti-slip of it. They are long as others have stated, but it hasn't bothered me at all in any of my exercises yet. Great value! Easy to use! Perfect for me! Each shipped in a different box that was secured completely. The boxes did not rip or tear. All the pieces/weights were in each box when they arrived. Shipping was fast too!
customer_reviews.author: Avid Reader

customer_reviews.title: 42lbs of Plates 9lbs of Nuts and Handles
customer_reviews.text: The description and title is a bit misleading... You get the following, 4x 7.5lbs plate 4x 3lbs plate 2x 3.5lbs handle 4x 0.5lbs collar All total 51lbs but can only make two 25lbs dumbells. The 25lbs was stated in the description but they failed to mention 4.5lbs of the 25 was the star nuts and handle. For someone that is buying these solely for the plates like myself you only get 42lbs of plates. The handles also are covered with sharp jagged edges that can scratch or cut you regardless of how "strong" your hands are like other reviews state. It's so bad that there are two stickers on each handle warning you about being scratched.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: Got these dumbbells to work out with during quarantine while the gyms were closed. It gets the job done, just some cons with it that is why its only 4 stars. One of the negative things is that its a hassle to keep twisting the ends to add or subtract weight so that in itself is a tedious workout. also the end stoppers have a tendency to get look and twist on their own when you're working out. One thing to note is that the handles are rough and will callous up your hands so just keep that in mind if your hands are sensitive or you don't want callouses.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Ha

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: Had an issue with one of the three boxes for this item getting lost in shipping. Seller solved the problem promptly without hassle. Item is well made and finishes have held up thus far (1.5 months). Only issue is the rubber grommets on the lock nuts must be lubricated almost time the weights are changed. The nuts will either come loose during a set or tear apart when removed. Luckily the item comes with extra grommets! Consider purchasing a second set of lock nuts if possible.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Okay dumbbell
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this due to covid causing all gyms closed. I couldn't weigh these so I don't know how accurate they are. But these give me good level of weights and quite sturdy after assembled. One note is that the product seemed put in a storage for a long time; it collected lots of dusts and having some stuff on it along with small metal pieces. So I needed to wash them out when I received it.
customer_reviews.author: Don

customer_reviews.title: Good, solid set of weights.
customer_reviews.text: Nothing fancy here, but well made and as durable as cast iron. No issues with the knurled handles, there are no splinters or sharp edges, but I always wrap them in grip tape anyway. The collars tighten on the plates and prevent any movement or rattling, the rubber gasket holds firm. I ordered the 105 Lb. set and the order was delivered came in two boxes, one day apart. I am satisfied with this order and would purchase from this vendor again with no reservations.
customer_reviews.author: D. Barnard

customer_reviews.title: Only 1 handle only in 52.5 lb set!
customer_reviews.text: As it turns out I got the 52.5 pound set which only has ONE HANDLE! This is stupid. I read reviews and questions before ordering which all indicated customers were receiving 2 handles. I managed to order the only kit with 1 handle? The quality of the weights is fine but I am not happy I now have to go buy a piece that really should have been included.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: These dumbbells are better than I anticipated them being
customer_reviews.text: These dumbbells are better than I anticipated them being. They are easy and pretty quick to change out, though probably not quick enough to switch in the middle of a workout, so be warned if that is what you want them for. I have used them to steadily increase the weight over the weeks, adding five pounds each week. In that way, these are much better than buying set after set of incremental dumbbells to use, and they take up much less space in the room. Also worth noting is that it is very easy to tighten the bolts enough to eliminate any weight shaking, which is something a lot of these types of dumbbells have problems with.
customer_reviews.author: Clay Gladura

customer_reviews.title: You aren't getting 40lbs of weights plus the bars, it's 40lbs of weight WITH the bars.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a set of 40lb dumbbells, the first thing you should realize is that they only give you a total of 32lbs worth of weights, I am assuming that the weight of the bar is considered part of the overall weight for this product, that wasn't what I was expecting though. Besides that, it's a good set of dumbbells.
customer_reviews.author: Kuehnau

customer_reviews.title: Good buy for your home gym
customer_reviews.text: I bought these while on quartine to try and keep up with the moves I learned in CrossFit. These dumbbells are perfect. I love that the weights are adjustable and fit under my coffee table. The handle is a little rough but works out if you are one of those people that sweat a lot. It will keep it from slipping out of your grip. Money well spent.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberlee N. Taylor

customer_reviews.title: As advertised
customer_reviews.text: The only thing I didn't like is that the maximum individual weight is 5 pounds. My fault. I should have bought a set with some 10 lb discs. Chrome bars are smooth, the fasteners and the bars have rubber gaskets to keep the weights in place, and the fasteners have a finger screw that clamps them down if needed (I haven't).
customer_reviews.author: Deputy Chuck

customer_reviews.title: Don’t work w quick release clamps due to threading
customer_reviews.text: We returned these. Unable to use quick release clamps with them b/c of the threading and takes too long etc to change the weights for use with videos. We had to invest more and get Olympic size dumbbells. If you just need something basic without timings between changing weights they’re a decent quality for the price.
customer_reviews.author: WA_Customer

product_meta.title: Yes4All Adjustable Dumbbells 40, 50, 52.5, 60, 105 to 200 lbs with Connector Options
product_meta.description:
WEIGHT PLATE SIZES AND PACKAGE CONTENTS:

Set of 40/50/60 LBS: Holes on weight plates fit 1-in diameter standard bar, Dumbbell Connector compatible with 1-inch spin-lock dumbbells.

Set of 52.5/100/105/190/200 LBS: Holes on weight plates fit 1.15-inch standard bar, Dumbbell Connector compatible with 1.15-inch spin-lock dumbbells.



 * 40 LBS SET– 2x Handles, 4x Collars, 4x 5-lbs Plates, 4x 3-lbs Plates
 * 40 LBS SET WITH DUMBBELL CONNECTOR COMBO – 2x Handles, 4x Collars, 4x 5-lbs Plates, 4x 3-lbs Plates and 1x Dumbbell Connector
 * 50 LBS SET – 2x Handles, 4x Collars, 4x 3-lbs Plates, 4x 7.5-lbs Plates
 * 50 LBS SET WITH DUMBBELL CONNECTOR COMBO – 2x Handles, 4x Collars, 4x 3-lbs Plates, 4x 7.5-lbs Plates and 1x Dumbbell Connector
 * 52.5 LBS – 1x Handle, 2x Collars, 8x 5-lbs Plates, 2x 2.5-lbs Plates, 2x 1.25-lb Plates
 * 60 LBS SET – 2x Handles, 4x Collars, 4x 5-lbs Plates, 4x 8-lbs Plates
 * 60 LBS SET WITH DUMBBELL CONNECTOR COMBO – 2x Handles, 4x Collars, 4x 5-lbs Plates, 4x 8-lbs Plates and 1x Dumbbell Connector
 * 100 LBS WITH DUMBBELL CONNECTOR COMBO – 2x Handles, 4x Collars, 4x 2.5-lbs Plates, 16x 5-lbs Plates and 1x Dumbbell Connector
 * 105 LBS SET – 2x Handle, 4x Collars, 16x 5-lbs Plates, 4x 2.5-lbs Plates, 4x 1.25-lb Plates
 * 105 LBS SET WITH WRIST STRAPS: – 2x Handle, 4x Collars, 16x 5-lbs Plates, 4x 2.5-lbs Plates, 4x 1.25-lb Plates, 2x Wrist Straps
 * 190 LBS WITH DUMBBELL CONNECTOR COMBO – 2x Handles, 4x Collars, 4x 5-lbs Plates, 16x 10-lbs Plates and 1x Dumbbell Connector
 * 200 LBS SET – 2x Handles, 4x Collars, 4x 2.5-lbs Plates, 4x 5-lbs Plates, 16x 10-lbs Plates


WARRANTY: 1-year warranty and 30-day return (contact seller for more details).
feature_bullets: SET OF 2 DUMBBELLS - 105 LBS TOTAL (52. 5 LBS EACH SIDE): TWO 16”x1. 15” handles, SIXTEEN 5-pound plates, FOUR 2. 5-pound plates, FOUR 1. 25-pound plates, FOUR collars handles, shipped in two packages.

CAST IRON WEIGHT PLATES FIT 1. 15-INCH STANDARD BAR: Accommodate all standard 1. 15-inch handles. Durable cast iron plates covered with black paint finish preventing rust and corrosion for lifetime use
16-INCH DIAMOND KNURLED CHROME HANDLE: Constructed of high-quality, textured chrome handle for secure, firm, and non-slip grip
STAR-LOCK COLLARS WITH LOOSE-RESISTANT RUBBER TRIMS: Threaded ends with star-lock collars provide a safe, secure workout & easy weight plate changes
EASY USE & STORAGE: Take seconds to assemble and take out. Compact, convenient, and easy to use. All-for-one dumbbells eliminate the need for multiple dumbbells in your workout space.

specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
